title: UWP framework for Geolocation and Marker based Augmented Reality applications (in replacement of GART and SLART toolkits)
body: Please make developing Augmented Reality (Geo and Marker) apps for all UW Platforms easy and UNIVERSAL with a good framework.  Improved and reliable Geolocation support is also a must have.

comments.body: I am looking for a C# based augmented reality SDK that can be used in my program. I have tried OpenCV, but their C# wrapper is not ready for Windows 10 UWP targeted for the ARM processor. Alternatively, I have researched and downloaded Microsoft's Vuforia SDK and it only supports C++ code. And finally there is Microsoft OpenCV (https://github.com/Microsoft/opencv/tree/master/samples) on git hub that is also written in C++. Not sure were to turn at this point.If anyone can help or know what direction I should be pointed in I would appreciate it.
I would very much like to see this too in UWP
